MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH3 postcode area of Guilden Sutton, affecting properties in Arrowcroft Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  02:58AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of repairs needed to an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midday today. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 06:50AM on 25th January 2021
